lead_paragraph: The Russian Yulia Efimova could be facing a lifetime ban from swimming after testing positive for meldonium, the news agency Tass reported.

headline.main: Russian Swimmer Tests Positive for Meldonium

snippet: The Russian Yulia Efimova could be facing a lifetime ban from swimming after testing positive for meldonium, the news agency Tass reported.
abstract: Four-time Russian breaststroke world champion Yulia Efimova faces lifetime ban from swimming after testing positive for meldonium.
